title: Best of the Program |  Guest: Gov. Pete Ricketts | 4/4/22
description:
Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss Billie Eilish and her musical influence. Nebraska Governor Pete Ricketts joins Glenn to discuss why he vetoed additional federal assistance that would have made citizens more reliant on the government. Glenn and Stu discuss Elon Musk becoming Twitter's largest shareholder and his coming out against ESG scores.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
